definition: Sumatra, one of the Indonesian islands
Perilla frutescens (Chinese basil or wild red basil)/place name/to revive/used as phonetic in transliteration
surname Su/abbr. for Soviet Union 蘇維埃|苏维埃 or 蘇聯|苏联/abbr. for Jiangsu province 江蘇|江苏/abbr. for Suzhou city 蘇州|苏州

gate/door/CL:扇[shan4]/gateway/doorway/CL:個|个[ge4]/opening/valve/switch/way to do something/knack/family/house/(religious) sect/school (of thought)/class/category/phylum or division (taxonomy)/classifier for large guns/classifier for lessons, subjects, branches of technology/(suffix) -gate (i.e. scandal; derived from Watergate)

sentences.english: First impressions of Sumatra are not good.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘給我的第一印象並不好。

sentences.english: The second case is a 27-year-old male from Solok, West Sumatra Province.
sentences.chinese: 第二例爲西蘇門答臘省索洛的一名27歲男子。

sentences.english: A thick smoke spews from the summit of Mount Sinabung as it erupts in Northern Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘北部的席納彭山頂部噴出濃厚的煙霧。

sentences.english: Twenty of the new cases are from the province of Banten, and one of the cases is from Lampung province, Sumatra.
sentences.chinese: 20例來自萬丹省，1例來自蘇門答臘楠榜省。

sentences.english: Subsidence and landslides were observed in Sumatra .
sentences.chinese: 沉陷和山體滑坡，觀察在蘇門答臘。

sentences.english: Sumatran's deep rich flavor lends itself perfectly to a nice dark roast.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘深重香氣讓其成爲很好的深色焙制咖啡。

sentences.english: A typical life span for Sumatran orangutans is 40 to 50 years.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘猩猩的平均壽命在40到50歲。

sentences.english: An earthquake of magnitude around 7 occurred in northern Sumatera.
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘北部發生了一次7級左右地震。

sentences.english: Similar stories came out in 2004 after the Sumatra quake.
sentences.chinese: 2004年蘇門答臘地震之後也發生了相同的事情。

sentences.english: The name of the Sumatran orangutan means "person of the forest."
sentences.chinese: 蘇門答臘猩猩的名字寓意“森林中的人”。

pinyin: Gang1 guo3 Min2 zhu3 Gong4 he2 guo2
